origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'WaterResourceAPI.analyze_data', 'description': 'This function analyzes the water resource data and provides insights on how it impacts the real estate project.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'reportData', 'type': 'JSON', 'description': 'The water resource impact assessment report data in JSON format.'}, {'name': 'regionData', 'type': 'JSON', 'description': 'The regional water resource data in JSON format.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis', 'description': 'The analysis of how the water resource data impacts the project.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行

调用工具 WaterResourceAPI.analyze_data, 它的参数输入如下: 'reportData'是'{"waterUsage": 50000, "waterSource": "River", "impactScore": 75}', 'regionData'是'{"averageWaterUsage": 45000, "waterSource": "River", "impactScore": 60}'.
